Our platform, filled with talents and sk: Our platform, filled with talents and skilled artisans from several sectors (gardener, electrician ...etc.). Its mission is to revolutionize the world of artisans, by connecting qualified and reliable professionals, who are looking to find rapidly new customers and projects, with people and companies who need their services.
Our skilled carpenters can add the final: Our skilled carpenters can add the final changes to your building project and install, maintain, and repair a wide range of residential, commercial, and industrial fixtures.
In both commercial and residential struc: In both commercial and residential structures, our qualified plumbers assist with the installation, maintenance, and repair of pipes, valves, fittings, drainage systems, and fixtures.
We have qualified welders on our platfor: We have qualified welders on our platform who assist with putting metal parts and products together and fixing metal component damage.
Our qualified electrician can install an: Our qualified electrician can install and fix electrical systems, fixtures, and wiring in buildings to address any electrical issues you may be experiencing.
Maintaining gardens and lawns, adding fe: Maintaining gardens and lawns, adding fertilizer, setting up outdoor lighting and sprinkler systems, and clearing snow, ice, and leaves are all tasks performed by landscapers.
Construct, extend, and fix residential,: Construct, extend, and fix residential, commercial, and other buildings as well as chimneys, walls, foundations, and ornamental masonry work.
If need someone that will establish prop: If need someone that will establish property boundaries, our surveyors are here to take exact measurements of your topographical features and areas.
Our ventilator is here to help you in de: Our ventilator is here to help you in designing, installing ductwork and duct fittings, as well as install air conditioning and ventilation equipment.

The my-craft solution is a web-based app: The my-craft solution is a web-based application created by M & Y Solutions to be used in order to link artisans, crafters, and skilled professionals with potential clients. Additionally, it makes it easier or less stressful for clients to look for qualified professional. The technician part and the client part are the two basic components of these web application. While clients visit the application, create an account by filling in all necessary information, and search for the nearest technician by using the city name, postal code, or language, technicians visit the application, register by filling in all necessary details that are secure, update their profiles, and wait for matches. For simple and efficient communication, My-craft-solution offers clients the option to look for a technician based on language.

My-craft-solution établit la présente Po: My-craft-solution establishes this Privacy Policy, the purpose of which is to transparently inform Users of the website hosted at the following address (my-craft-solutions.be/) (hereinafter the Site), of the manner in which personalized data is collected and processed by the Data Controller.

My-craft-solution est libre de choisir t: My-craft-solution is free to choose any natural or legal person who processes users' personal data at its request and on its behalf (hereinafter the Processor). Where applicable, My-craft-solution undertakes to select a Processor offering sufficient guarantees as to the technical and organizational security measures for the processing of personal data, with regard to the Law and the Regulation.
L’utilisation du site par les Utilisateu: The use of the site by users may result in the communication of personal data. Conformément à l’article 15 du Règlement: In accordance with Article 15 of the Regulation, My-craft-solution guarantees the right of access to the User to his personal data. The User has the right to obtain access to said personal data as well as the following information:
les catégories de données à caractère pe: the categories of personal data concerned;
les destinataires ou catégories de desti: the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, in particular recipients who are established in third countries or international organizations;
lorsque cela est possible, la durée de c: where possible, the intended period of retention of personal data or, where this is not possible, the criteria used to determine that period;
l’existence d’une prise de décision auto: the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, as referred to in Article 22(1) and (4) of the Regulation, and, at least in such cases, information concerning the underlying logic, as well as the significance and intended consequences of such processing for the data subject.
Le Responsable du Traitement peut exiger: The Processor may require payment of a reasonable fee based on administrative costs for any additional copies requested by the User.
Lorsque l’Utilisateur introduit cette de: Where the User makes such a request electronically (through the email address, for example), the information shall be provided in a commonly used electronic form, unless the User requests otherwise.
La copie de ses données sera communiquée: The copy of his data will be communicated to the User no later than one month after the receipt of the request.

Conformément à l’article 19 du Règlement: In accordance with Article 19 of the Regulation, the Controller shall notify each recipient to whom personal data have been disclosed of any rectification of the personal data, unless such disclosure proves impossible or requires disproportionate effort. The Controller shall provide the data subject with information about such recipients if he or she so requests.
L’Utilisateur a le droit d’obtenir l’eff: The User has the right to obtain the erasure of his personal data as soon as possible in the cases listed in Article 17 of the Regulation.
Les deux paragraphes précédents ne s’app: The preceding two paragraphs shall not apply to the extent that such processing is necessary:
à l’exercice du droit à la liberté d’exp: to the exercise of the right to freedom of expression and information;
pour respecter une obligation légale qui: to comply with a legal obligation requiring the processing laid down by Union law or by the law of the Member State to which the Controller is subject, or to perform a task carried out in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the Controller;
à la constatation, à l’exercice ou à la: to the establishment, exercise or defense of legal rights.

The controller shall provide the data subject with information about such recipients if he or she so requests.
L’Utilisateur a le droit d’obtenir la li: The User has the right to obtain the limitation of the processing of his/her personal data in the cases listed in Article 19 of the Regulation.

The Controller shall provide the data subject with information about such recipients if he or she so requests.
Conformément à l’article 20 du Règlement: In accordance with Article 20 of the Regulation, Users have the right to receive from My-craft-solution personal data concerning them in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format. Users have the right to transmit such data to another controller without My-craft-solution hindering this in the cases provided for in the Regulation.
Lorsque l’Utilisateur exerce son droit à: When the User exercises her right to data portability pursuant to the previous paragraph, she has the right to obtain that the personal data be transmitted directly from one data controller to another, when technically possible.
L’exercice du droit de portabilité des d: The exercise of the right to data portability shall be without prejudice to the right to erasure. This right shall not apply to processing necessary for the performance of a task in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the controller.
Le droit de portabilité des données ne p: The right to data portability does not affect the rights and freedoms of third parties.
Droit d’opposition et prise de décision: The right to data portability does not affect the rights and freedoms of third parties.
L’Utilisateur dispose à tout moment du d: The User has the right at any time to object to the processing of his personal data due to his particular circumstances, including the automation of data carried out by My-craft-solution. In accordance with Article 21 of the Regulation, My-craft-solution will no longer process personal data, unless there are compelling legitimate grounds for the processing that override the interests and rights and freedoms of the User, or for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims.
Lorsque les données à caractère personne: Where personal data is processed for canvassing purposes, the User has the right to object at any time to the processing of her personal data for such canvassing purposes, including profiling insofar as it is related to such canvassing.
Lorsque la personne concernée s’oppose a: Where the data subject objects to the processing for canvassing purposes, the personal data shall no longer be processed for such purposes.

Le site utilise des cookies pour disting: The site uses cookies to distinguish Users of the site. This allows us to provide Users with a better browsing experience and an improvement of the site and its content. The purposes and terms of cookies are contained in this article.
Un “Cookie” est un fichier déposé tempor: A Cookie is a file deposited temporarily or permanently on the User's hard disk when consulting the website, with a view to a subsequent connection. Thanks to cookies, the server recognizes the User's computer.

Différents types de cookies sont utilisé: Different types of cookies are used by My-craft-solution on the site :
Les cookies techniques ils sont nécessa: Technical cookies: they are necessary for the operation of the website, allow the communication of data entered and are intended to facilitate the User's navigation.
Les cookies de mesure statistiques et d’: Statistical and audience measurement cookies: these cookies allow the recognition of the User and are used to count the number of Users of the website over a certain period. Since they also indicate browsing behaviour, they are an effective means of improving the User's browsing experience by displaying proposals and offers likely to be of interest to him. They also allow My-craft-solution to identify possible bugs on the website and to correct them.
Les cookies fonctionnels ces cookies fa: Functional cookies: these cookies facilitate the use of the website by retaining certain choices introduced (for example language)
Les cookies de traçage My-craft-solutio: Tracking cookies My-craft-solution uses tracking cookies via Google Analytics, to measure the interaction of Users with the content of the site and to produce anonymous statistics. These statistics allow My-craft-solution to improve the website. Google supports the explanation of these cookies at the following address
Les cookies sont conservés pour le temps: Cookies are kept for the time necessary to achieve the purpose. The cookies likely to be stored on the User's hard drive as well as their retention period are as follows: 10 years.
Si l’Utilisateur ne veut pas que le site: If the User does not want the website to place cookies on his or her hard drive, it is easy for him or her to manage or delete them by modifying the browser settings. Browser programming also allows the User to receive a notice or notification when a website is using cookies and thus decide whether to accept or reject them.
Si l’Utilisateur désactive certains cook: If the User disables certain cookies, he/she agrees that the internal website may not function optimally. Some parts of the website may thus not be usable, or may be partially usable.
Si l’Utilisateur souhaite ainsi gérer et: If the User wishes to manage and/or delete certain cookies in this way, he/she may do so by using the following link(s):

My-craft-solution strongly advises persons exercising parental authority over minors to promote responsible and secure use of the Internet. The data controller cannot be held responsible for collecting and processing personal data from minors under the age of 16 whose consent is not effectively covered by that of their legal parents or for incorrect data - in particular regarding age - entered by minors. Under no circumstances will personal data be processed by the Data Controller if the User specifies that he or she is under 16 years of age.

En application de la réglementation appl: In accordance with the regulations applicable to personal data, users have the following rights, which can be exercised by sending a request to the following address: info@my-craft-solutions.be
le droit d’accès ils peuvent exercer le: the right of access: they can exercise their right of access, to know the personal data concerning them. In this case, before implementing this right, the website may request proof of the User's identity in order to verify its accuracy.

le droit de s’opposer au traitement des: the right to object to the processing of data: users may object to their data being processed in accordance with the assumptions set out in the GDPR.
le droit à la portabilité ils peuvent r: the right to portability: they can demand that the website gives them the personal data provided to it in order to transmit it to a new website.
Le site web se réserve le droit d’apport: The website reserves the right to make changes to this privacy policy at any time. If a change is made to this privacy policy, the website undertakes to publish the new version on its website. My-craft-solution will also inform users of the change by e-mail at least 15 days before the effective date. If the user does not agree with the terms of the new wording of the personal data protection clause, the user has the option of deleting his account.
Le site My-craft-solution peut collecter: The My-craft-solution site may automatically collect standard information.
